author: R Sivaraman
text:
The Election Commission has issued a price chart for food and snacks in Puducherry to assess the election expenditure during the forthcoming General Elections to the Puducherry Legislative Assembly.

District Election Officer-cum-District Collector S.Sundaravadivelu said the Election Commission of India (ECI) has issued several instructions for monitoring expenditure during the elections as a part of curbing the use of money power. Hence, in order to assess the election expenditure of contesting candidates, in respect of the various items, the rates have been finalised.

The rates have also been notified for the information of the general public, political parties and interested persons for assessing the election expenditure. The Election Expenditure Monitoring Cell will assess the expenditure based on the rates given or the actuals, whichever is higher.

According to the notification, the prevailing rate of a cup of tea, sundal is Rs.7, meals- Rs.40, vegetable briyani- Rs.25, curd rice- Rs.20, two idlies- Rs.15 and chicken briyani -Rs.90. The rates of other snacks were also given.

The election authority also stated the rates of labour, machinery and minor works such as erection of shamiana, wooden stage, pandal, hiring charges for providing barricade arrangements with casurina poles. It also notified hiring charges for sound system arrangements.
title: EC issues rate list on poll expenses
